text_block_list.text: (Step step step step……!)

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Trainer, hurry up! This way!

Before the Selection Race started. Copano Rickey had felt that 
something strange was afoot, and was now rushing up the stairs 
inside school. And then―
(Bang!)

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: The roof! If it's here then……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Because if you want to get a good look at everything, it's best 
to look from a high place! It's making practical use of urban 
planning, 『Geographical Feng Shui』.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Now then, the reason there was a change in the qi……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Ah, over there! That corner! The trainers are gathering there a 
little more than usual. And the reason is……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Part of the course is being repaired? And there are a large 
number of frontrunner Uma Musume in the next race, so they want 
to get a good look. Both of these happening at the same time.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, if we just let it go, it could become dangerous! We 
should stop them before they start!
choice_data_list: We can't, we won't make it

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Kuu……even if we yell from here!? If we contact them with our 
smartphones, do you think they'll believe us?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Thankfully, the strange qi doesn't seem to be getting stronger. 
Hopefully it can stabilize with the change in qi―
And then the race started―

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A
text_block_list.text:
Wha-!? They're moving diagonally……!? 
Where are you looking……!? Get out of the way!

text_block_list.name: Horsegirl B
text_block_list.text: No, you should get out of the way! Kuu……!

There were no disqualifications or accidents but…… 
just as Copano Rickey predicted, the race was pretty chaotic.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Fuu……I'm glad nothing serious happened. 
Hopefully, it stays like this.
choice_data_list: But, how did you know? Intuition?
But, how did you know? Intuition?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Intuition? No way! Feng Shui isn't something so vague, it's a 
respectable discipline!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Remember, we saw it when we were on the roof earlier, right? 
And so, what I noticed was―

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
The direction of the "flow"……to the northwest, 
was where those trainers had gathered to spectate, you see.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
The participating Uma Musume were conscious of this, and the flow 
pulled them towards that spot. "Battling for a Lucky Strike", 
that kind of qi, it would be natural for it to gather there―

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Losing sight of the small things in that scramble, like not 
focusing on the corner ahead of you. It wouldn't be strange for 
you to start jostling each other for position.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
A corner where those feelings collide, you could call it the 
cautionary boundary of the 8 trigrams. This is―

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
-What someone attuned to Feng Shui like me can see. No, not just 
me, if you understand Feng Shui, anyone could notice and help 
prevent this from happening.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Feng Shui isn't something occult. It's the result 
of 3000 years of accumulation and refinement of 
"The Science of Environmental Fortune".

I thought she was just an Uma Musume that was in to the occult, 
but it seems I was mistaken. She could make proper predictions 
backed with supporting evidence.

The Feng Shui Uma Musume, Copano Rickey. Compared to my first 
impression of her, it seemed like she was an upright Uma Musume 
with an immeasurable hidden potential.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
See? Now you understand the greatness of Feng Shui, right!? Being 
able to see the future! 『Together we'll spread this knowledge!』, 
that's what you're thinking, right!?
choice_data_list: No, it's a little soon for that……
No, it's a little soon for that……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Eeeeh!? You're pretty stubborn, huh?

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Then we just need to finish it with one more push! 
Just watch me in the next race!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Once more, I'll properly show you the power of Feng 
Shui, so just watch!☆ After that, you'll be a believer. 
This time'll be even more amazing.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
I am always at harmony with the Earth. When I 
run seriously, I can hear the "Voice of the Earth"! 
Let's go! Rickey!☆ Lucky!☆ Victory!

『I can hear the "Voice of the Earth"』. After leaving 
behind those words, Copano Rickey went to participate 
in her Selection Race, a mile on turf.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
(Start! Alright, there's no trouble, and the formation is just 
like I predicted! And if I imagine overlaying the 8 trigrams, 
it's easy to read the positioning)

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: For now, I'll just stay like this☆

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
(Right here! Just before the last corner! Getting a read now is 
crucial! The qi around me, I need to focus on it……!)

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
All that's left is to listen to the voice of the Earth…… 
Just let the flow of qi guide me……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text: Now, show me the way―!!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Wait, huh？ Huh？？ 
Huuuuh？？？？

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
I can't hear the voice today!? No way, you've gotta be kidding! 
Aaaaaaaaaah～～～～……!

And like that, Copano Rickey……rather than showing the power of 
Feng Shui, unfortunately she was defeated……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Trainer, it's not like that! I'm telling you it's not like that! 
Usually I can properly hear the voice of the Earth and run well!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Today, my form must have been a little off. Was it an imbalance 
of the 5 elements? Or environmental conditions? Or maybe 
the trouble from the previous race affected it……?

Rickey, it was unfortunate, wasn't it……? But, this result, you 
could say it was expected, or obvious even……

You can't keep going on about Feng Shui this, and Feng Shui that. 
You need to open your eyes, and do your training properly!

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Tarumae…… 
You were watching that race just now……

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Nice to meet you. I'm Rickey's acquaintance, my name is Hokko 
Tarumae. I'm from Tomakomai, I'm currently acting as my 
hometown's local idol, a "Locodol".

text_block_list.name: Hokko Tarumae
text_block_list.text:
Rickey's always been trying to push Feng Shui 
on to me, and it's been troubling. I've been wondering 
when she'll reflect on that and stop.

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
You still don't believe me, Tarumae? 
The power of Feng Shui is real! But……

text_block_list.name: Copano Rickey
text_block_list.text:
What went wrong today? 
Uuuuu, I don't get iiiiiiiit!!

In front of her friend, Hokko Tarumae, Copano Rickey was 
frustrated. Does she really have the power of Feng Shui? If she 
does……why did it fail?
